titles.title: A resolution expressing the importance of the United States alliance with the Republic of Korea and the contributions of Korean Americans in the United States.
A resolution expressing the importance of the United States alliance with the Republic of Korea and the contributions of Korean Americans in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and with an amended preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 366.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the importance of the U.S.-Korea alliance in promoting peace and security in the Indo-Pacific region and calls for further strengthening ties between the countries.
